forms.app7_prompt: Is the publications list per Appendix 7 prepared and certified by the Publication Activity department?
forms.omid_prompt: Is the application for pre-examination to the Graduate Office (OMiD) ready?
forms.omid_info_after_yes: Your application has been submitted. The Graduate Office will send a letter to the Scientific Committee to set the date and appoint two reviewers. The hearing date will be no earlier than 30 calendar days after the reviewers are appointed.
forms.nk_confirm_info: Please confirm you have prepared and checked the full document package. Continue to scheduling the SC hearing?

gateway.prompt: Proceed to the next chapter? You can unlock it now.

journey.reset_hint: You can reset your journey to start over.

upload.not_supported: File uploads will be available soon.

decision.instructions: Confirm when this checkpoint is ready.

forms.nk.done_info: Answers saved. Proceeding to the next step…

home.contacts_hint: Find and copy your supervisors’ contact details.
home.hero_subtitle: Navigate your doctoral journey with clarity and confidence
